faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Find answers to common questions about FloorOneX pricing and plans.

items.q1: Can I change my plan anytime?
items.a1: Yes. You can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will apply according to your current billing cycle.
items.a2: Yes. Customers can request quotes and manage projects completely free of charge.
items.a3: Professionals pay a commission or subscription depending on their plan, only when they secure jobs through the platform.
items.a4: Yes. There are no long-term contracts. You can cancel or pause your plan at any time.
items.q5: Do you offer discounts for startups or large teams?
items.a5: Yes. We offer tailored pricing for large companies and early-stage businesses. Contact our sales team for details.
items.q6: What happens if I exceed my plan limits?
items.a6: We will notify you in advance and help you upgrade or adjust your plan. Your access is never cut off without notice.

cta.title: Need a custom solution?
cta.description: Our team can design a tailored pricing and feature package for large flooring companies or nationwide operations.
